bean.read: select id as "id", name as "name", description as "description", start_date as "startDate", end_date as "endDate", is_active as "isActive", creation_date as "creationDate", last_modified as "lastModified" from io_folder where id = ${this.id}
select id as "id" from io_folder where lower(name) = lower(${this.name})
select id as "id" from io_folder where lower(description) = lower(${this.description})
select id as "id" from io_folder where lower(is_active) = lower(${this.isActive})
bean.update: update io_folder set name = ${this.name}, description = ${this.description}, start_date = ${this.startDate}, end_date = ${this.endDate}, is_active = ${this.isActive}, last_modified = ${this.now()} where id = ${this.id}
